title: Wipro partners with Intel Foundry for chip innovation tech
description: This partnership between Wipro and Intel Foundry aims to address the rising demand for artificial intelligence (AI) chip manufacturing as companies across the world fight to release generative AI-enabled products.
content: Indian IT major Wipro has expanded its collaboration with Intel Foundry to accelerate chip design innovation in the semiconductor and hi-tech space, it said on Wednesday."As the key design services and alliance partner, Wipro will work with Intel Foundry to accelerate the development of Intelâ€™s most advanced process nodes, including the Intel18A process node," the Bengaluru-based software services exporter said in a regulatory filing.The global AI chip market is expected to average a compounded growth rate of 38% annually from 2023 to 2032, Wipro added in the filing.The collaboration between Wipro and Intel Foundry is designed to address the rising demand for AI chip manufacturing as companies race to roll out generative AI-enabled products."This new collaboration with Intel Foundry marks a significant step towards becoming a part of the
